data.message:
In Japan, many children don't eat breakfast at home, but they pay the breakfast to which some good local small resturants offer.
I expect that America is No.1 Democratic country.

replies.message:
Japanese were forced to believe the living God, the Japanese emperor.
We were gunned by Japanese police, even if we were Japanese.

You think that that is like North Korea.
And Japanese emperor were North Korean.

I don't have a Japanese friend, even I am a real Japanese.
I am a victim of gang stalking by Korean Soka since I was 3 years old.

I read not only white but also black gum people.
So I can't see all from your comments.

But white is wilder about this point.
I don't meet a Japanese, so I don't know our characters.
I suspect that all people doubtful.

They rumore about me and I don't know about them.
They may rumor about me, that I am not a Japanese.
But no one ask me.

He is a North korean spi, who will kill me.
I never follow him.
